resources.string: The OS update has started. This may take some time depending on your network connection speed.
Restart your phone to complete the update.
It\'s important that you keep in mind that installing an older OS version will make loose features.
Are you sure you want to go forward with it despite all the implications?
I know and understand all implication of performing this installation
an older version of your current OS.
a different OS from your current one.
Your OS is up to date
Error downloading config file. Link used:
Developer mode enabled for this session
No space available on SD Card.
This update will erase all your data.\nDo you want to continue?
This update will erase all your data.
The file youâ€™re trying to download is too large for mobile connections (~200MB). Please enable Wi-Fi connection and try again.
Google apps installation is occurring on the background. Please try again later.

For the full Android and Google mobile experience like the Google Play store, your phone needs extra content and software. Unfortunately, as Fairphone doesn\'t have a license yet, we cannot pre-install this content, nor can we provide it directly ourselves. We are working with the content owner to achieve this.\nPress "I Agree" below to download this content from an external secured source. Installing this content is your own responsibility.\nIf you do not agree, your phone will still work with basic Android apps, of course, but you will miss some services from Google.
Fairphone OS could not obtain the necessary permissions to install Google Apps. If you chose DENY, please restart the installer and ALLOW permissions.
Google Apps are installed. Could not reboot device, please reboot manually.
Fairphone OS will now ask you for Superuser access. We assure you it\'s perfectly safe. Please choose ALLOW when asked.
The system needs to reboot to complete the installation.\n\nAfter the reboot, follow the steps to set up Google Apps.
Error downloading files, please try again.
The file you\'re trying to download is too large for mobile connections (~100MB). Please enable Wi-Fi connection and try again.
To reinstall the Play store on your phone, you must go to All Apps, Widgets, then drag the Google Apps Installer widget to your Home panel and select it.
Fairphone Updater is updating your OS on the background. Please try again later.
